languages.text: {n}Приблизившись к {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатору{/g}, вы замечаете несколько глубоких царапин на металле, оставленных огромными когтями. Несмотря на повреждения, машина в рабочем состоянии.{/n}

{n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Приблизившись к {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатору{/g}, вы замечаете несколько глубоких царапин на металле, оставленных огромными когтями. Несмотря на повреждения, машина в рабочем состоянии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As you approach the cogitator, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}
{n}As you approach the cogitator, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你接近这台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}时，你注意到它的金属表面有很多巨型爪子留下的深深的划痕。尽管这台机器表面有着明显的损坏，但它似乎依然处于工作状态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你接近这台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}时，你注意到它的金属表面有很多巨型爪子留下的深深的划痕。尽管这台机器表面有着明显的损坏，但它似乎依然处于工作状态。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Según te acercas al {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, te percatas de una serie de profundos arañazos que una garra de gran tamaño ha infligido en su superficie metálica. A pesar de los daños aparentes, la máquina parece funcionar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Según te acercas al {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, te percatas de una serie de profundos arañazos que una garra de gran tamaño ha infligido en su superficie metálica. A pesar de los daños aparentes, la máquina parece funcionar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に近づくと、表面の金属に大きな爪で傷つけられたいくつもの深い傷跡があることに気づく。かなりのダメージにもかかわらず、機械は正常に動いているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に近づくと、表面の金属に大きな爪で傷つけられたいくつもの深い傷跡があることに気づく。かなりのダメージにもかかわらず、機械は正常に動いているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich dem {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} näherst, bemerkst du mehrere tiefe Kratzer auf der Metalloberfläche, wie von großen Klauen. Trotz der offensichtlichen Beschädigung scheint die Maschine funktionsfähig zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich dem {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} näherst, bemerkst du mehrere tiefe Kratzer auf der Metalloberfläche, wie von großen Klauen. Trotz der offensichtlichen Beschädigung scheint die Maschine funktionsfähig zu sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De nombreuses et profondes rayures laissées par d'énormes griffes à la surface métallique du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} attirent votre attention. Malgré les dégâts apparents, la machine semble encore être en état de marche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De nombreuses et profondes rayures laissées par d'énormes griffes à la surface métallique du {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} attirent votre attention. Malgré les dégâts apparents, la machine semble encore être en état de marche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayara{/g} yaklaştığında, metal yüzeylerinde büyük pençelerin açtığı bir dizi derin çizik fark ediyorsun. Makine, görünür hasara rağmen çalışır durumda gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, you notice a number of deep scratches left by huge claws on its metal surfaces. Despite the apparent damage, the machine seems to be in working condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g}a yaklaştığında, metal yüzeylerinde büyük pençelerin açtığı bir dizi derin çizik fark ediyorsun. Makine, görünür hasara rağmen çalışır durumda gibi görünüyor.{/n}
